chapters.title: Chapter 7: A Matter of Thought
chapters.info: Gera, p. 151 (202)—One of the cooks in Salidar. She dreamed her way into Tel'aran'rhiod for a brief moment while the six sisters and two Accepted were there; she was dreaming of being an Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah, much to the dismay of Carlinya.
